verses.text: Fools say \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* heart, ‘There \w is|strong="H1732"\w* no God.’ Vile, hateful \w their|strong="H5921"\w* life \w is|strong="H1732"\w*; \w not|strong="H1732"\w* one does good.

\w From|strong="H3820"\w* heaven God looks \w out|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H6213"\w* humans, \w to|strong="H6213"\w* see if \w any|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* wise, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* care \w for|strong="H6213"\w* God.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* turned bad, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* taint \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w*; \w not|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w does|strong="H3426"\w* good, \w no|strong="H7200"\w*, \w not|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Have|strong="H1571"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* learned \w their|strong="H3605"\w* lesson, \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w workers|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H6213"\w*? \w Who|strong="H3605"\w* ate \w up|strong="H6213"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1571"\w*, eating, devouring, never calling \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd Lord\nd*.

Sore afraid \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w*, \w where|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* fear \w was|strong="H3808"\w*; \w when|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* scatters \w the|strong="H3045"\w* bones \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* godless \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* put \w to|strong="H7121"\w* shame, \w when|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* rejects \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w help|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* Zion would \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Israel! \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* brings \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* change \w of|strong="H6106"\w* fortune, \w how|strong="H3588"\w* glad \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* Israel \w how|strong="H3588"\w* joyful!
